#!/bin/bash # Create a select menu in Bash scripts

PS3='Please enter your choice: ' options=(“Option 1” “Option 2” “Option3” “Quit”) select opt in “${options[@]}” do 

  case $opt in
      "Option 1")
          echo "you chose choice 1"
          ;;
      "Option 2")
          echo "you chose choice 2"
          ;;
      "Option 3")
          echo "you chose choice 3"
          ;;
      "Quit")
          break
          ;;
      *) echo invalid option;;
  esac

done
